title: Himi 583
lyrics:
M.Kh.
1.
ʻĒ kuo tō mai ʻa e taufa,
Pupula ‘a e tahi mo hou;
‘O hopo ‘a e ngaahi peau na
Ki vaka, ‘o fakapūlou.
“Kuo tau tuʻutāmaki;
‘Eiki, ‘afē te Ke ‘ā?
‘Ikai pē te Ke toka’i
Kuo tau tō ni ki mala?”
“E talangofua ki he’eku fekau,
‘Oua e ngū! ‘Oua e ngū!
Matangi mo tahi mo ngaahi peau,
‘A e Tēvolo mo ʻene kongakau,
Māmani mo Langi kotoa kuo pau,
Te nau ‘ilo ‘a e le’o ‘o honau Hau.
‘E nonga kotoa ‘o kapau te u lau,
“’Oua e ngū! ‘Oua e ngu!’”
2.
Hangē ‘a e tahi ko ena
Pehē ‘a si’i Kongakau.
He ‘atamai kuo ‘āvea,
Tōmohopo he ngaahi peau.
Heka ni fa’ahi ki loto -
Langi, ‘afē te ke ‘ā? -
Si’i laumālie kuo ngoto,
Kuo alangavakā.
“’E talangofua, etc.”
3.
Hangē ‘a e tahi ko ena
Pehē ‘a e mo’ui ko eni.
He ‘aho ni ‘oku tau heka;
Laolao kotoa ‘o lelei.
Tō mai e fakaevaha,
Hoko ‘a e tu’utāmaki:
Ngāue kae ‘ikai malava,
‘Ikai tokoni ‘a Langi.
“ ‘E talangofua, etc”
4.
Kāinga, fiemālie
Neongo e ‘ikai ke ‘ā
‘A Langi, ka ‘oku mea’i pē
‘A e tō mai ‘a e faingata’a.
ʻĒ, ta tatali kitaua,
‘Oku Ne ‘afio’i:
‘Oua ke hoko ‘a e houa
Pea ‘e fakahaofi.
“E talangofua ki he’eku fekau,
‘Oua e ngū! ‘Oua e ngū!
Matangi mo tahi mo ngaahi peau,
‘A e Tēvolo mo ʻene kongakau,
Māmani mo Langi kotoa kuo pau,
Te nau ‘ilo ‘a e le’o ‘o honau Hau.
‘E nonga kotoa ‘o kapau te u lau,
“’Oua e ngū! ‘Oua e ngu!’” *
